item.title: Docker環境の構築
item.description: [基本環境] Debian 10.3.0 (amd64) Docker 19.03.8 (安定版) [Dockerのインストール] sudo apt update sudo apt install apt-transport-https sudo apt install ca-certificates sudo apt install curl sudo apt install gnupg2 sudo apt istall software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.
